title: Hope Clinic
cleaned_text: Hope Clinic - The Hope Clinic is part of the [Emory University Vaccine Research Center](http://www.vaccines.emory.edu/)and is the only HIV vaccine trial site in Atlanta. - It was established in 2002 to perform HIV vaccine and biomedical or behavioral prevention efficacy trials in HIV-uninfected at-risk populations, and early phase prevention trials in lower-risk HIV negative populations. - This site conducts studies from the [HIV Prevention Strategies (HPTN)](http://www.hptn.org/)and [HIV Vaccine Trials (HVTN)](http://www.hvtn.org/en.html)networks, among
